name: Alvanoid
description:
Ur Jonathan, a line with strings, u have a friend, mr. senior, he doesn't know what is he's doing with his life. One day when our heroes where enjoyin' life, a line appear just down they. Then Jonathan try to save his friend from that line, the badest line.

literaly a copy of the classic Arkanoid of 1986

if the game at the start crash, try to repeat loading it
